Protected Attributes

ISKeyVaultKey * m_pKey
 The wrapped native key.
 
AttributesDictionary ^ m_dictAttributes
 The managed attribute dictionary that marshals data back and forth between the managed and unmanaged key.
 
AttributesDictionary ^ m_dictMutableAttributes
 The managed attribute dictionary that marshals data back and forth between the managed and unmanaged key.
 
KeyObligationsMap ^ m_keyObligations
 The managed obligation dictionary that marshals data back and forth between the managed and unmanaged key.
 

Properties

String^ Id [get, set]
 The ID of the key, also known as the key tag.
 
array< byte >^ KeyBytes [get, set]
 The raw key bytes. More...
 
AttributesDictionary^ Attributes [get, set]
 used to define protection key attributes. For example, when creating a key with createKeys(), attributes can be provided to the keys being created. The attributes used (if any) when creating a key will also be given back when retrieving the keys via getKeys().
 
AttributesDictionary^ MutableAttributes [get, set]
 used to define protection mutable key attributes. For example, when creating a key with createKeys(), attributes can be provided to the keys being created. The mutable attributes used (if any) when creating a key will also be given back when retrieving the keys via getKeys().
 
KeyObligationsMap^ Obligations [get, set]
 Key obligations are provided by the Ionic policy engine in order to define any number of restrictions, limitations, allowances, etc. regarding the use of the data protection key. These obligations should be respected by the user of the key to the extent possible.
 
Int64 IssuedServerTimeUtcSeconds [get, set]
 The issued time of the key measured in UTC seconds according to server time.
 
Int64 ExpirationServerTimeUtcSeconds [get, set]
 The expiration time of the key measured in UTC seconds according to server time.
 

Detailed Description

A class that creates a key that can be stored offline.
